attr.name: nodeId
attr.description: Unambiguous number of the search node

attr.name: treeTypNr
attr.description: Product Section of the search node (KT->999)

attr.name: stufe
attr.description: Number of the hierachical level of the search

attr.name: nodeParentId
attr.description: Node_id of an entry in the relevant superior hierachy level that is allocated this search node

attr.name: sortNr
attr.description: Sorting order of the search node that belongs to as node_parent_id

attr.name: wertOk
attr.description: 0, when grouping, 1, when the generic article is allowed for this code
